name: SPSS Program File
summary: Learn about .SPS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To run an SPS file, choose File → Open → Syntax..., select your SPS file, and then choose Run → All after the file is opened. You can also step through SPS files using the Run → Step Through option, or run a selection of the file by choosing Run → Selection.

description: Program file used by SPSS, a statistical analysis application; saved in a plain text format and contains instructions written using the SPSS syntax; generally developed with the SPSS Syntax Editor; used for manipulating datasets and automating statistical analyses.
